definition: (dialect) critical juncture/crucial moment/Taiwan pr. [jie2 gu5 yan3]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
bone
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
erhua variant of 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: At this point, he threatened to kill a hostage.
sentences.chinese: 在这个节骨眼上，他威胁杀死人质。

sentences.english: Right at that point, a tortoise came crawling into view.
sentences.chinese: 就在这个节骨眼儿上，一只乌龟爬了过来。

sentences.english: Quincy returned at this very juncture.
sentences.chinese: 正在这个节骨眼上，昆西回来了。

sentences.english: What is the market scenario in precious metals at this juncture?
sentences.chinese: 在这样一个节骨眼上，贵金属市场表现如何呢？

sentences.english: A new problem cropped out at this critical moment.
sentences.chinese: 就在这个节骨眼儿上突然出现了一个新问题。

sentences.english: Not enough people want to buy an American product at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这个节骨眼上，想买美国汽车的人并不够多。

definition: erhua variant of 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
at that moment/just then
urgent and important moment (idiom); critical juncture
juncture/moment
classifier for affairs, events etc
if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
branch road/setback/accident/hiccup
a new branch grows out of a knot (idiom); fig. side issues keep arising
troubled times/eventful period
to cause sth unfortunate to happen (to oneself or sb else)/to do sth inauspicious/to have a stroke of bad luck
to deliberately complicate an issue (idiom)
to urge sb on
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
halfway/midway/on the way
to lose one's cool/to get impatient/unable to remain calm
